Package com.cafean.client.validation.util

Class AsciiCaretListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.client.validation.util.AsciiCaretListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.CaretListener
    public final class AsciiCaretListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.CaretListener
    A thread which updates the caret position displayed on the screen. This takes place off of the event thread so that updates need not finish before the next key can be typed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AsciiCaretListener​(AbstractModel model, javax.swing.JTextPane textArea, java.util.List<ExportContext> contextList, javax.swing.JTextField contextField, javax.swing.JLabel caretLabel, javax.swing.JButton editButton)
      Creates a new caret listener for use in a validation or ASCII display.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AsciiCaretListener

        public AsciiCaretListener​(AbstractModel model,
                          javax.swing.JTextPane textArea,
                          java.util.List<ExportContext> contextList,
                          javax.swing.JTextField contextField,
                          javax.swing.JLabel caretLabel,
                          javax.swing.JButton editButton)
        Creates a new caret listener for use in a validation or ASCII display.
        Parameters:
        model -
        textArea - the JTextPane used to display the ASCII
        contextList - a List of the export context objects used in the display
        contextField - the JTextField in which to place the description of the current caret position in the text pane.
        caretLabel - the JLabel in which to place the caret location row/col
        editButton - the JButton to enable/disable based on the selection
